titles.title: A resolution urging the people of the United States to observe Global Family Day and One Day of Peace and Sharing on January 1, 2010.
A resolution urging the people of the United States to observe Global Family Day and One Day of Peace and Sharing on January 1, 2010.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Requests: (1) the people of the United States to observe Global Family Day and One Day of Peace and Sharing on January 1, 2010, with activities stressing the need to eradicate violence and poverty and to establish greater fellowship among peace-loving countries and families everywhere; and (2) American businesses, labor organizations, and faith and civic leaders to join in promoting appropriate activities for Americans and in extending appropriate greetings from the families of the United States to families in the rest of the world.
